mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from board1230 where delyn='N'
mapper.update: update board1230 set viewcnt=NVL(viewcnt,0)+1 where bidx = #{bidx}
mapper.select: select * from board1230 where delyn='N' and bidx = #{bidx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board1230(bidx,originbidx,depth,level_, subject, contents,writer,ip, midx,pwd,filename) VALUES(bidx_seq.nextval,bidx_seq.nextval,0,0,#{subject},#{contents},#{writer},#{ip},#{midx},#{pwd},#{filename})
mapper.update: update board1230 set subject=#{subject}, contents=#{contents}, writer=#{writer}, filename=#{filename}, midx=#{midx}, ip=#{ip} where bidx=#{bidx} and pwd=#{pwd}
update board1230 set delyn='Y' where bidx=#{bidx} and pwd=#{pwd}
update board1230 set depth=depth+1 where originbidx=#{originbidx} and depth> #{depth}
